content: @Ana Trisovic uh oh, the PR we made (#9595) still needs more work. I just left a comment and converted it to draft.
@Jan Range at least the indexing problem I mentioned was due to this! Phew! :sweat_smile: The "develop" branch should be fine.
Oh thats a pity :frown: Is it possible to use the display pattern as a regex for solr to extract the actual value? I think the addition of the names are really helpful
I haven't dug it in the code yet but I'm hoping is a matter of switching from the "display value" to the "raw value" or something.
Philip Durbin has marked this topic as resolved.
